New Experiment - NHL DFS

11 February 2020

I’ve been a lifelong hockey fan, played fantasy sports for 20+ years, and have been curious about the realm of daily fantasy sports providers ever since the industry received press when their employees were fixing bets against their own customers. I’m excited for my first experiment this year.
